Text:
Thanks for this box.


I saw John at Woodstock and this puts me right back there "way up on the hill" on that sunny saturday afternoon, I can almost taste the hash we were smoking.

Happy 40th anniversary!
Track 1...track 2...NO SONG TITLES...you dumb piece of shit

Well, yes, it would have been more convenient to already have the song titles on them, but anyone can copy and paste them in from the track list provided. I am just grateful that these are provided, the only torrent here, for one of my all time favorite performers.

Thank you very much, and I apologize for all of us grateful recipients for the one ingrate.
I join in thanking you, rasgoan, for this treasure. Retitling 79 tracks will be a bit tedious....but so what? Free treasure is worth a tad of tedium. And nothing excuses dgs2004's rudeness.

Wow, that was weird! I downloaded the torrent, I seeded it back to a ratio of 1.10....and now suddenly it is GONE, not on any tracker, there is no such torrent anywhere that Transmission can detect. I guess I'll stop trying to seed it...but I wonder what happened. I wanted to keep seeding it for a couple of weeks, just out of love for Sebastian's music.
